english: Defects in hemostasis may be inherited or acquired .
chinese: 止血作用缺陷可能是先天性的、也可能是后天性的。

english: Here is a congenital bicuspid aortic valve
chinese: 这是一个先天性的两瓣叶主动脉瓣。

english: Nature of heaven and earth means the inherent factor in the human nature
chinese: .天地之性是指人性中先天性的因素

english: Congenital blemish has two kinds , one kind is can genetic , one kind is won ' t genetic
chinese: 先天性的缺陷有两类，一类是能够遗传的，一类是不会遗传的。

english: Congenital lactose intolerance is very rare and is an inherited metabolic disorder rather than an allergy
chinese: 先天性的乳糖不耐受是非常罕见的遗传性的代谢紊乱，而并非过敏。
先天性的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The report suggests that fibromuscular dysplasia of the renal arteries is acquired and may not be presented from birth
chinese: 本报告认为该肾动脉肌纤维发育异常是后天的，可能不是先天性的。

english: These congenital lesions arise from abnormal separation of the endoderm and neuroectoderm during embryogenesis
chinese: 这些先天性的异常是因为再胚胎发育时，内胚层与神经外胚层不正常的分离所造成的。

english: A reasonable objection to such a system is that it is based on press reports , not verified scientific data
chinese: 这样一个系统存在一个先天性的缺陷：它建立在媒体报道的基础上，而非严谨的科学数据。

english: Some genetic disorders are evident at birth ( i . e . are congenital ) , particularly those resulting in abnormalities of physical development
chinese: 一些遗传病在出生时已很明显（即先天性的） ，特别是那些导致身体发育畸形的遗传病。

english: Coronary artery fistulas ( cafs ) are mostly congenital , but they have been reported to be acquired as complications of chest trauma or medical procedures
chinese: 摘要冠状动脉瘘管是属于先天性的疾病，但是也有可能会因为胸部创伤或者是特定医疗行为的并发症所产生。

english: A long - standing obstruction ( probably congenital ) at the ureteral orifice through which the metal probe passes led to the marked hydroureter and hydronephrosis seen here
chinese: 用金属探针指示了在输尿管口的长期阻塞（可能是先天性的） 。此处明显肾盂积水和输尿管积水由阻塞引起。

english: Unfortunately , researches in this field are not deep enough though there are some achievements . the lack of theoretical foundation is the key reason to the current disadvantages
chinese: 从深层次看,行政公开的内在支撑不足是根本原因,理论基础的缺位给行政公开造成了先天性的不足。

english: Whether be congenital sufficient evaginate , when leave hospital the hospital should be informed , if not be born in the hospital , should have a new life to the hospital routine check - up
chinese: 是否是先天性的足外翻，在出院时医院应该告知，假如不是在医院生的，应该到医院进行新生儿的例行体检。

english: All of the patients receiving the lab - grown bladders were born with a bladder disease that causes high urinary pressure and can lead to life - threatening damage to the kidney
chinese: 所有植入人工培育膀胱的患者都患有先天性的膀胱疾病，这种病导致泌尿压过高，从而对肾脏造成可能引起生命危险的损害。

english: Operation sunrise is a nonprofit international program dedicated to helping children and young people around the world who suffer from cleft lips and palates and other facial birth defects
chinese: 辰光行动’是一个非赢的国际的计划主要是致力于帮助全球的患有兔唇和其他的面部有先天性的缺陷的儿童和年轻人。
